abilities.name: Telepor Slam
about: Teleports encounter to random location in an area
Strikes enemy foes down with a powerful blow

abilities.name: Spectral Throw
about: Throws a spectral copy of encounter's melee weapon. It flies out and then returns to the encounter, in a spinning attack that damages enemies in its path

abilities.name: Dash
about: Performs a quick teleport towards a targeted location

abilities.name: Blade Blossom
about: Creates knives on the ground which fly upwards after a short delay

abilities.name: Summon Clones
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter
